name: Electric Sheep (mellowcool, melo_toni, coolrex56)
description:
Play as a robot in the dreams of a young girl who struggles to express herself emotionally. Help the girl find her heart and learn to express herself, or fail and leave her no better than how she started. 

Credits:

Music/SFX:  melo_toni

VFX: coolrex56 / melo_toni 

Development: coolrex56 / melo_toni 

Design:  coolrex56 / melo_toni
